title: What books, papers and literature do you recommend in learning about the Iroquois' culture and history? - Quora

response.answer_text: For serious research: Start out with the Papers of Sir William Johnson.Then move on to the Jesuit Relations.For a lighter informational excursion: Allen W. Eckert, Wilderness EmpireColin G. Galloway, Dawnland Encounters, Indians and Europeans in Northern New EnglandIan K. Steele, Warpaths, Invasions of North AmericaStanley Vestal, King of the Fur Traders, The Deeds and Deviltry of Pierre Espirit RadissonMy own: Wilderness Warfare: The Northeast Woodlands, 1609 – 1764 A Leatherstocking Companion, Novels and Narratives as History Family Life in Native America
